trends: There have been 42 other sightings in Lincoln
There were no other sightings in Lincoln on or around July 18th 2011
divs: Sighting Detailsi was out at the park looking at the stars, i am an avid ufo watcher and had been looking for strange things in the sky. i sat on the bench for about 15 minutes and saw nothing,then just when i was about to call it a night i saw a flash towards the north east that seemed strange, and blue in color, so i kept my eyes on that point for a minute or two and saw this flash again in theexact same place, it did this off and on every minute or two at random intervals. i saw satilites, and the normal planes fly by all night, it was not any of these, and seemed too high in the atmosphere to be an airplane. i wanted to stay and watch it for longer however the recent heat wave made even nightime unbearable, i got up and headed home happy i saw something strange and very interesting, i will keep mufon posted on strange occurances in this lonely town out here between lincoln and omaha
